turkish_example_sentence: Biz o güzel pastayı yapmışsak, misafirler çok sevinirdi.
english_example_sentence: If we had made that beautiful cake, the guests would have been very happy.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы мы испекли тот красивый торт, гости были бы очень рады.
